alert.note: Alert for Eastern San Miguel County; Guadalupe County; Lower Rio Grande Valley; Middle Rio Grande Valley, Albuquerque Metro Area; Quay County; South Central Highlands (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: Hard Freeze Warning issued April 04 at 8:53PM MDT until April 05 at 9:00AM MDT by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: ...HARD FREEZE WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO 9 AM MDT WEDNESDAY... ...HIGH WIND WARNING WILL EXPIRE AT 9 PM MDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Sub-freezing temperatures ranging from near 20 to 28 degrees. * WHERE...Middle Rio Grande Valley including the Albuquerque Metro Area, Lower Rio Grande Valley, South Central Highlands, Eastern San Miguel County, Guadalupe County, and Quay County. * WHEN...From Midnight tonight to 9 AM MDT Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions could kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold.

area.areaDesc: Eastern San Miguel County; Guadalupe County; Lower Rio Grande Valley; Middle Rio Grande Valley, Albuquerque Metro Area; Quay County; South Central Highlands
